segments.text: From my angle, I can see the puddle growing larger by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both fascinating and horrifying to witness this domestic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, continuing her chore without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the puddle, and yet she stays focused!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she really doesn’t feel the water seeping around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are still attempting to get cookies, lost in their own adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a slow-motion train wreck.
segments.speaker: PAR
